sub_title: Business Analyst - Sustainable energy and electric mobility
summary:
Hi there! I am Aarav and I am interested in sustainability and data analytics. I am interested in combining data analysis and sustainability practices to deliver practical business advice, insights and solutions for clients in the renewable energy and electric mobility domain. 

I am looking forward to connecting with people mutual interests and enthusiasm for sustainable development.

Risk assessment - Performing risk assessments by reviewing processes and if all relevant risks were covered by the client's control framework in place. This entailed performing inquiry with relevant stakeholders on different levels (from operational to managerial) and walkthrough meetings.

Process analysis - Analysing processes to ensure that the appropriate risks were covered, identifying potential efficiency and quality improvements and bridge the gaps between the actual and desired state.

I work on a multitude of clients from the energy, retail, manufacturing, transport & logistics sector and SOx compliant clients.  In terms of organisational skills and exposure, I have gained a first-hand experience in conducting client meetings with different stakeholders and coaching fellow associates on the job.", 'title': 'Risk Management Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 278038, 'name': 'The Energy and Resources Institute', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQHFRd_ZdTlZCg/company-logo_400_400/0/1687504676504?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=6h0SP0vR2Ox_4B5vgk67SiHrZjdUwWfgIUOaO-zAnKc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/teriin/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'New Delhi Area, India', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'TERI - The Energy and Resources Institute', 'description': "Intern working on the topic 'Business model development for rooftop solar in the warehousing industry'
